title: [Health] New study adds to growing body of evidence of financial hardship caused by the US health care system. Hospital lawsuits over unpaid bills increased by 37% in Wisconsin from 2001-18, with lawsuits disproportionally affecting Black patients and people living in poorer, less densely populated counties.

[Health] Red meat consumption (both unprocessed and processed), was associated with significantly increased risk of developing nonalcoholic fatty liver disease. This association was mediated largely by obesity.
